verbs.description: jcpenney [V: is] enticing workers with free vacations to new york and miami as retail war for talent heats up jcpenney is on the hunt for 39 000 seasonal workers this year to aid in its search it hosted a nationwide hiring day where applicants were invited to come in to their local store and interview for jobs canada target banff challenger miami new york city agco macy andrew challenger national retail federation new york kohl vice president jcpenney target corporation
